verses.verse: I <S%G1263>charge<s%> you <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> shall <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G2198>quick<s%> and the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2596>at<s%> his <S%G2015>appearing<s%> and his <S%G932>kingdom;<s%>

<S%G2784>Preach<s%> the <S%G3056>word;<s%> be <S%G2186>instant<s%> in <S%G2121>season,<s%> out of <S%G171>season;<s%> <S%G1651>reprove,<s%> <S%G2008>rebuke,<s%> <S%G3870>exhort<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3115>long-suffering<s%> and <S%G1322>doctrine.<s%>

For the <S%G2540>time<s%> will <S%G1511>come<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> they will not <S%G430>endure<s%> <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine;<s%> but <S%G2596>after<s%> their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1939>lusts<s%> shall they <S%G2002>heap<s%> to <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G1320>teachers,<s%> having <S%G2833>itching<s%> <S%G189>ears;<s%>
And they shall <S%G654>turn<s%> <S%G654>away<s%> their <S%G189>ears<s%> from the <S%G225>truth,<s%> and shall be <S%G654>turned<s%> to <S%G3454>fables.<s%>

But <S%G3525>watch<s%> you in <S%G3956>all<s%> things, <S%G2553>endure<s%> <S%G2553>afflictions,<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> of an <S%G2099>evangelist,<s%> <S%G4135>make<s%> <S%G4135>full<s%> <S%G4135>proof<s%> of your <S%G1248>ministry.<s%>
For I am <S%G2236>now<s%> <S%G4689>ready<s%> to be <S%G4689>offered,<s%> and the <S%G2540>time<s%> of my <S%G359>departure<s%> is <S%G2186>at<s%> <S%G2186>hand.<s%>
I have <S%G75>fought<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G73>fight,<s%> I have <S%G5055>finished<s%> my <S%G1408>course,<s%> I have <S%G5083>kept<s%> the <S%G4102>faith:<s%>

From now <S%G3063>on<s%> there is <S%G606>laid<s%> up for me a <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G2923>judge,<s%> shall <S%G591>give<s%> me <S%G1722>at<s%> that <S%G2250>day:<s%> and not to me <S%G3440>only,<s%> but to <S%G3956>all<s%> them <S%G2532>also<s%> that <S%G25>love<s%> his <S%G2015>appearing.<s%>
<S%G4704>Do<s%> your <S%G4704>diligence<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5030>shortly<s%> to me:

For <S%G1214>Demas<s%> has <S%G1459>forsaken<s%> me, having <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G3568>present<s%> <S%G165>world,<s%> and is <S%G4198>departed<s%> to <S%G2332>Thessalonica;<s%> <S%G2913>Crescens<s%> to <S%G1053>Galatia,<s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%> to <S%G1149>Dalmatia.<s%>
<S%G3441>Only<s%> <S%G3065>Luke<s%> is with me. <S%G353>Take<s%> <S%G3138>Mark,<s%> and <S%G71>bring<s%> him with you: for he is <S%G2173>profitable<s%> to me for the <S%G1248>ministry.<s%>
And <S%G5190>Tychicus<s%> have I <S%G649>sent<s%> to <S%G2181>Ephesus.<s%>

The <S%G5341>cloak<s%> that I <S%G620>left<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5174>Troas<s%> with <S%G2591>Carpus,<s%> when you <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G5342>bring<s%> with you, and the <S%G975>books,<s%> but <S%G3122>especially<s%> the <S%G3200>parchments.<s%>

<S%G223>Alexander<s%> the <S%G5471>coppersmith<s%> <S%G1731>did<s%> me <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2556>evil:<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G591>reward<s%> him <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G2041>works:<s%>
Of <S%G3739>whom<s%> be you <S%G5442>ware<s%> <S%G2532>also;<s%> for he has <S%G3029>greatly<s%> <S%G436>withstood<s%> our <S%G3056>words.<s%>

<S%G1722>At<s%> my <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G627>answer<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G4836>stood<s%> with me, but <S%G3956>all<s%> men <S%G1459>forsook<s%> me: I pray God that it may not be <S%G3049>laid<s%> to their <S%G3049>charge.<s%>

Notwithstanding the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3936>stood<s%> with me, and <S%G1743>strengthened<s%> me; that by me the <S%G2782>preaching<s%> might be <S%G4135>fully<s%> <S%G4135>known,<s%> and that <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> might <S%G191>hear:<s%> and I was <S%G4506>delivered<s%> out of the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of the <S%G3023>lion.<s%>

And the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> shall <S%G4506>deliver<s%> me from <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G2041>work,<s%> and will <S%G4982>preserve<s%> me to his <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> <S%G932>kingdom:<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> be <S%G1391>glory<s%> for <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
<S%G782>Salute<s%> <S%G4251>Prisca<s%> and <S%G207>Aquila,<s%> and the <S%G3624>household<s%> of <S%G3683>Onesiphorus.<s%>
<S%G2037>Erastus<s%> <S%G3306>stayed<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2882>Corinth:<s%> but <S%G5161>Trophimus<s%> have I <S%G620>left<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3399>Miletum<s%> <S%G770>sick.<s%>

<S%G4704>Do<s%> your <S%G4704>diligence<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G5494>winter.<s%> <S%G2103>Eubulus<s%> <S%G782>greets<s%> you, and <S%G4227>Pudens,<s%> and <S%G3044>Linus,<s%> and <S%G2803>Claudia,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G80>brothers.<s%>

The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be with your <S%G4151>spirit.<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> be with you. <S%G281>Amen.<s%> The second epistle unto Timotheus, ordained the first bishop of the church of the Ephesians, was written from Rome, when Paul was brought before Nero the second time.
